Package ml.alternet.misc

Misc classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputStreamAggregator
    InputStreamAggregator aggregates several InputStreams into a single one.
    Invoker
    A class that allow to access members with restricted access.
    JNDIInitialContextFactory
    A factory that supplies an initial context that stores bindings in a map.
    ReaderAggregator
    ReaderAggregator aggregates several Readers into a single one.
    SoftHashMap<K,V>
    A soft map that discards its entry on memory leaks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScalarType
    The Java basic scalar types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OmgException
    As the name suggest, an unforeseen exception that shouldn't be thrown, and therefore that some processing is missing; not as critical as an unexpected exception.
    TodoException
    An exception that indicates that something remains to do in the development.
    WtfException
    As the name suggest, an unexpected exception.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    InfoClass
    Force the retention of package-info.
    ToDo
    Mark things that are to do in the development.
